court: IN IN IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
judgment_text:
:1:

IN IN IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY

IN IN IN INSOLVENCY INSOLVENCY INSOLVENCY

REPORT REPORT REPORT NO. 161 OF 2006 NO. 161 OF 2006 NO. 161 OF 2006

IN IN IN

INSOLVENCY INSOLVENCY INSOLVENCY NO. 51 OF 1968 NO. 51 OF 1968 NO. 51 OF 1968

Re.: 1.M/s. Hansraj Inderpal a Firm & Ors.

. K. Labooram.

. H. Kanayalal (Partner).

... Insolvent.

Ex-parte :

Amarlal Sugnichand.

... Petitioning Creditors.

.....

Mr. G.G. Ketkar, 1st Asstt. to Official Assignee.

.....

CORAM CORAM CORAM : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,J. : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,J. : DR. D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,J.

ND ND ND DECEMBER, 2006. DECEMBER, 2006. DECEMBER, 2006.

P.C. P.C. P.C. : : :

.

The prayer of the Official Assignee is to the

following effect :-

(a)

The Official Assignee be permitted

to

club

the estate account in the name of

H.

Inderpal

&

Co.,

and

H.

Kanayalal

(Personal)

in

order

to

declare

and

distribute

dividend

to

the

unsecured

creditors

of

the H.

Inderpal &

Co.,

on

their proved unsecured liability of

Rs.8.54,420/-.

.

There is no reason why the prayer should not be

granted. The Report is made absolute in terms of prayer

clause (a).

-----
